Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43551 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-43551 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-3, affected by CVE-2022-43551
